entry.string: What is it?
entry.translation: Vhet is it?

entry.string: is a simple script to display your site's banners, and allow others to link to your site with them.
entry.translation: is a seemple-a screept tu deespley yuoor seete's bunners, und elloo oozeers tu leenk tu yuoor seete-a veet zeem.

entry.string: Displays the image of each of your site's banners.
entry.translation: Deespleys zee imege-a ooff iech ooff yuoor seete's bunners. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Provides a text box containing the HTML to display the banner and link to your site.
entry.translation: Prufeedes a text bux cunteeening zee HTML tu deespley zee bunner und leenk tu yuoor seete-a.

entry.string: Provides instructions to users for linking to your site with one of your banners
entry.translation: Prufeedes instroocshuns tu users fur leenking tu yuoor seete-a veet oone-a ooff yuoor bunners

entry.string: NOTE:
entry.translation: NOTE:

entry.string: This module currently serves the banners directly from your web server.
entry.translation: Thees mudoole-a coorrently serfes zee bunners durectly frum yuoor veb serfer. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: How to use it?
entry.translation: Hoo tu use-a it?

entry.string: There is one main option for administration - Modify Configuration. Prior to configuration, prepare your banner files and directory:
entry.translation: Zeere-a is oone-a meeen oopshun fur edmeenistreshun - Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun. Preeur tu cunffeegooreshun, prepere-a yuoor bunner feeles und durectury:

entry.string: Copy all of your site's banners into a directory which is in your web site path. This is the banner image directory that you can specify in the configuration setup. By default it is set to a subdirectory of the xarimages directory in the xarLinkMe directory.
entry.translation: Cupy ell ooff yuoor seete's bunners intu a durectury vheech is in yuoor veb seete-a pet. Thees is zee bunner imege-a durectury thet yuoo cun speceeffy in zee cunffeegooreshun setoop. By deffoolt it is set tu a soobdurectury ooff zee xereemeges durectury in zee xerLeenkMe-a durectury. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Make sure that the only files in your banner directory are your banner image files. For security, you can have a blank index.htm(l) file as well.
entry.translation: Meke-a soore-a thet zee oonly feeles in yuoor bunner durectury ere-a yuoor bunner imege-a feeles. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Fur secooreety, yuoo cun hefe-a a blunk index.htm(l) feele-a es vell.

entry.string: When naming your banner image files, give them a descriptive name, usually including the dimensions of the banner eg
entry.translation: Vhee nemeeng yuoor bunner imege-a feeles, geefe-a zeem a descreeptife-a neme-a, usooelly incloodeeng zee deemensiuns ooff zee bunner ig

entry.string: Fill in the required information in the Modify Configuration Option
entry.translation: Feell in zee reqooured inffurmeshun in zee Mudeeffy Cunffeegooreshun Oopshun

entry.string: Go to the
entry.translation: Gu tu zee

entry.string: user view of xarLinkMe
entry.translation: user feeoo ooff xerLeenkMe

entry.string: to see the resulting banner list.
entry.translation: tu see-a zee resoolteeng bunner leest. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Included Blocks
entry.translation: Inclooded Blucks

entry.string: There are no blocks included.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu blucks inclooded. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Included Hooks
entry.translation: Inclooded Huuks

entry.string: This module has no hooks provided.
entry.translation: Thees mudoole-a hes nu huuks prufeeded. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
